text:
一個保養合宜的女人撫了撫暴跳如雷的男人，擰眉看向[redacted_name]，「[redacted_name]啊，今天可不僅是你爸爸的五十大壽啊，你不會不知道宋少爺今天來是和你姐姐相親的。 兩家合作在即，你這一巴掌，可壞了大事了！」
一邊說著，女人還扯過沙發上沉默不語的長髮少女，「你來這個家也一個多月了，阿姨和你姐姐自問對你不差。」
trans:
A well-maintained woman stroked the furious man and frowned at [redacted_name], "[redacted_name], today is not just your father's fiftieth birthday. You can't possibly not know that Master Song is here to meet your sister for matchmaking. The two families are about to cooperate, and your slap has ruined everything!"
As she spoke, the woman pulled over the long-haired girl who was silent on the sofa and said, "You have been in this family for more than a month. Your auntie here and your sister believe that you have been well treated."
